thread.section_title: Spa Store Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Spa Store Australia | spastore.com.au
thread.title: Brad
thread.title_full: Spa Store Australia reviewed by Brad

author: Brad
title: Brad
text:
Despite receiving an e-mail confirming my order had been dispatched, it never arrived. I rang for an update, but my call was not returned. After a follow-up call, I eventually learned that my order had not been shipped at all.
On the plus-side, the order was then shipped the following day, and has since arrived - within one week of actually being shipped.
